c74object.name: o.if
c74object.digest: Route an OSC packet based on the results of an expression
c74object.description: o.if routs the incoming bundle out the left outlet if the result of the expression is true or non-zero, and out the right outlet otherwise.

inlet.description: An odot bundle to perform a conditional expression on.

outlet.digest: Input, if expression evaluates to true or non-zero
outlet.description: The input, if the conditional expression evaluates to true or non-zero

outlet.digest: Input, if the conditional expression evaluates to false or zero
outlet.description: The input, if the conditional expression evaluates to false or zero.

objarg.name: expression
objarg.description: An expression yielding true or false.

method.name: FullPacket [variable]
method.digest: odot bundle to perform expression on
method.description: An odot bundle to perform expression on. If the expression evaluates to true or non-zero, it is output from the left outlet. Otherwise, the expression is output from the right outlet.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Perform the expression using an empty bundle as input
method.description: Perform the expression using an empty bundle as input.

method.name: dictionary [variable]
method.digest: A Max dictionary to be evaluated
method.description: o.if converts a Max dictionary to an odot bundle and processes it as a FullPacket.

method.name: doc
method.digest: Output an odot bundle containing the documentation of the object
method.description: Outputs an odot bundle containing object name, short and long descriptions of object operation, inlet and outlet information, and see also (where available).

method.name: doc-cat
method.digest: Output an odot bundle containing documentation categories
method.description: Outputs an odot bundle containing all of the categories of the odot expression language. An optional argument for the particular category will output sub-categories of available documentation (e.g. "doc-cat /math/power").

method.name: doc-category
method.digest: Output an odot bundle containing documentation categories
method.description: Outputs an odot bundle containing all of the categories of the odot expression language. An optional argument for the particular category will output sub-categories of available documentation (e.g. "doc-category /math/power").

method.name: doc-func
method.digest: Output an odot bundle containing documentation for a particular function
method.description: Outputs an odot bundle containing the detailed information about a particular function in the odot expression language. For a list of functions in a category, use "doc-cat [category]", for a list of categories, use "doc-cat" without arguments. For example, "doc-func exp" will output detailed information about the "exp" function in /math/power category.

method.name: doc-function
method.digest: Output an odot bundle containing documentation for functions
method.description: Outputs an odot bundle containing the detailed information about a particular function in the odot expression language. For a list of functions in a category, use "doc-category [category]", for a list of categories, use "doc-category" without arguments. For example, "doc-function exp" will output detailed information about the "exp" function in /math/power category.

method.name: post-ast
method.digest: Print Abstract Syntax Tree to the Max window
method.description: Prints a LISP-like expression of the abstract syntax tree of the expression to the Max window.

method.name: version
method.description: Prints the current odot build version to the Max Window.

c74object.discussion: o.if provides odot programmer with conditional flow semantics. Upon receiving a bundle, o.if uses that bundle's addresses and data as the context for evaluating the expression. If the result of experession is true or non-zero, the bundle is output out of the left outlet. Otherwise, it is output from the right outlet. o.if is used to route data to the appropriate patches based on some state variables in the data.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (FullPacket)
entry.description: An odot bundle to evaluate using the conditional expression.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (FullPacket)
entry.description: The incoming odot bundle, if the expression returns true or non-zero (FullPacket).

entry.name: Outlet 2 (FullPacket)
entry.description: The incoming odot bundle, if the expression returns false or zero (FullPacket).
